name: Mariko: Hot Nightlife
description:
Mariko is a university student. She wants to go to a nightclub and make new acquaintances today. You can make a choice for her how to spend this evening.

Will it be really hot this evening? The choice is yours!Features
  • Visual novel game with sexy content;
  • Nonlinear text with different storylines;
  • Drastic story that will branch according to your "choice";
  • Surprising ending;
  • Steam achievements (accessible after "The End" scene).
